text:
@realDonaldTrump Why can't the taxpayers of America have daily Pandemic briefings by the actual #COVID19 Response team?  Why does @realDonaldTrump have to grandstand when the country is falling apart?  We just want updates, not cancellations because #DiaperDonald's feelings are hurt. 

@PressSec
